replies.body: When you are honor 5 and still havent got one honor capsule
Got honour level 3 today on my new account without even trying, it's really not that hard if you naturally play like a god in your games and people keep honouring you
Stop being a fun sponge, let him be happy for his accomplishments instead of targeting him out and demeaning his achievements.

Wow opened my notifications to yet again see you twice, you really like to mess with me don't you? How about you do me a favour and legit fuck off from my comments? I'm sick of listening to your squabble and trying to call me out like I'm a bad guy. I meant NOTHING TOXIC from what I said you imbecile I was just commenting on how I achieved honour 3 so easily, but it's always like I'm trying to attack someone in your eyes isn't it? From that other post you made about calling that guy out it seems obvious that you like to harass people and trigger them on purpose then laugh about it afterwards like they are a bunch of idiots. You are no better then a stupid troll trying to look like someone who's bringing a positive influence to the boards.

Not sure what you consider flaming, I call people out when they comment stupid stuff like yourself or when someone says something unnecessary, but everything else is my opinion on the topic of the discussion. If you don't like my opinion then turn off your computer and go outside.

Opinions are like dicks. Just cause you have one does not make it special or mean everyone wants to see it.

Let the guy enjoy his achievement

Did you read my other comment? Specifically this part :

"I meant NOTHING TOXIC from what I said you imbecile I was just commenting on how I achieved honour 3 so easily,"
